fields.summary: iOS: Children are not removed from parents view hierarchy when context is shutdown

comments.body: Affect version is not only 2.1.0 but 2.0.1GA2 and 2.0.2GA are also affected. I think the problem comes with Titanium Mobile SDK version 2 layout changes (I haven't checked SDK code changes). I did not notice this problem when using 1.8.x.
